data.description: Position SummarySamsung Electronics America, Inc. is now accepting applications for its Summer 2026 Intern Program. This exciting opportunity offers a paid, 10-week experience for selected UNDERGRAD OR GRAD (based on HM request) students. The program will run from June 1 to August 7. Eligible students will be seniors or recent graduates, possess U.S. work authorization, and be able to work full-time on a 5-day-per-week on-site schedule. Additionally, participation in this program requires that you be located in the United States for the duration of the engagement.Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so early submission is encouraged. The application window is open until March 15, 2026; however, it may close earlier if all available roles are filled. Applications submitted after the application window or once a role is closed/projects are full will not be considered.Headquartered in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., Samsung Electronics America, Inc. (SEA), the U.S. Sales and Marketing subsidiary, is a leader in mobile technologies, consumer electronics, home appliances, enterprise solutions and networks systems. For more than four decades, Samsung has driven innovation, economic growth and workforce opportunity across the United States—investing over $100 billion and employing more than 20,000 people nationwide. By integrating our large portfolio of products, services and AI technology, we’re creating smarter, sustainable and more connected experiences that empower people to live better. SEA is a wholly owned subsidiary of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. To learn more, visit Samsung.com. For the latest news, visit news.samsung.com/us.Role and ResponsibilitiesPosition Summary:We are seeking a motivated intern to join our strategy department within a sales organization. The intern will focus on automating data cleaning, report creation, and distribution processes to enhance operational efficiency. The role involves reverse engineering existing reports, optimizing Excel files, and implementing improvements to reduce manual work and improve performance. Familiarity with Python for scripting and automation will be an added advantage. This is a unique opportunity to make an immediate impact on the day-to-day operations of a multi-billion-dollar account. The ideal candidate will have a comprehensive understanding of Microsoft Excel, strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to work proactively in an organized manner.Responsibilities and Learning OpportunitiesAutomate Data Cleaning Processes: Develop and implement Python scripts to streamline data cleaning tasks, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy. Opportunity to enhance Python scripting and automation skills.Reverse Engineer Existing Reports: Analyze and understand the structure and logic of current reports to identify areas for improvement and optimization. Chance to deepen knowledge in report analysis and data visualization.Optimize Excel Files: Review and enhance complex Excel files, including formulas and macros, to improve efficiency and performance. Opportunity to master advanced Excel functionalities and best practices.Create and Distribute Reports: Design and automate the creation of reports, ensuring timely and accurate distribution to relevant stakeholders. Chance to learn about effective reporting strategies and tools.Reduce Manual Work: Identify repetitive tasks and implement solutions to minimize manual intervention, enhancing overall operational efficiency. Opportunity to develop problem-solving and process improvement skills.Improve Performance: Propose and implement changes to existing processes to improve speed, accuracy, and reliability. Chance to gain experience in performance optimization techniques.Collaborate with the Team: Work closely with the sales strategy team to understand their needs and provide solutions that enhance their day-to-day operations. Opportunity to develop teamwork and communication skills.Proactively Identify Issues: Anticipate potential problems and propose solutions to prevent disruptions in the workflow. Chance to enhance critical thinking and proactive planning abilities.Maintain Organized Documentation: Keep detailed records of processes, changes, and improvements for future reference and scalability. Opportunity to learn about documentation best practices and project management.Leverage Python for Automation: Utilize Python scripting skills to automate complex tasks and integrate with existing systems for seamless operations. Chance to expand Python programming expertise in a real-world business context.Skills:Prior experience with data analysis, Excel automation, Python scripting, or similar projects is a plus.Soft Skills: Strong communication skills, ability to work collaboratively, and adaptability to new challenges.Proficiency in Microsoft Excel: Advanced knowledge of Excel functions, formulas, and features to optimize and improve existing reports.Python Programming: Familiarity with Python for data manipulation, automation, and scripting to enhance efficiency.Data Cleaning and Processing: Ability to clean, organize, and process large datasets efficiently using both Excel and Python.QualificationsEducation:Currently enrolled as an undergraduate student (or recent graduate).Seniors or recent graduates preferred.Technical Skills:Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel (functions, formulas, features).Familiarity with Python for data manipulation, automation, and scripting.Experience with data cleaning and processing using Excel and Python.Soft Skills:Strong communication and collaboration skills.Strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities.Ability to work proactively and adapt to new challenges.Preferred Experience:Prior experience with data analysis, Excel automation, Python scripting, or similar projects.Skills and Qualifications#LI-DNI* Please visit Samsung membership to see Privacy Policy, which defaults according to your location.
